definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: beat, crush by beating (NH id.; Aram. [[כְּתַת]]);—

beat or crush fine, of a potter's vessel Is 30:14, the golden calf De 9:21 (+ [[טָחוֹן הֵיטֵב]]); a sacrificial vicitim Le 22:24 (i.e. its testicles; + [[מָעוּח]] [[נׇתוּק]] [[כָּרוּת]]); fig. of enemies Ps 89:24.

definitions.title: Qal 1.
definitions.body: beat or crush fine 2Ki 18:4, 2Ch 34:7 (of images); fig. of devastating the land Zec 11:6.

definitions.title: Pu.
definitions.body: Pf. 3 mpl. [[וְכֻתְּתוּ]] 2Ch 15:6 and they were beaten in pieces, one nation against another.

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: Impf. 3 mpl. [[וַיַּכְּתוּ]] De 1:44 beat in pieces an enemy, sf. [[וַיַּכּוּם וַיַּכְּתוּם]] Nu 14:45.

definitions.title: Hoph.
definitions.body: Impf. 3 ms. [[וּשְׁאִיׇּה יֻכַּת־שָָׁעַר]] Is 24:12 and to ruins is the gate crushed; 3 mpl. [[יֻכַּתּוּ]] Mic 1:7 (of idol-images); fig. of warriors Je 46:5; of frail man Job 4:20.
